footer.description: AgriBloom provides verified, research-backed farming insights to empower Indian farmers and agriculture learners.
footer.demoNote: *This website is built for demonstration and educational purposes only.
footer.copyright: ┬й 2025 AgriBloom. All rights reserved. | Built for demonstration purposes only.
footer.dataSource: Data sourced from certified agricultural bodies including ICAR, KVKs, state agri portals, and government resources.

demo.title: Agribloom: Mandi Prices & Weather
demo.subtitle: Experience real-time weather insights, market price intelligence, and multilingual support for modern agriculture.
demo.weatherDesc: Get real-time weather data based on your location with AI-powered farming recommendations
demo.multilingualDesc: All alerts and advice available in your local language for better understanding
demo.marketDesc: Compare prices across different mandis to maximize your profits
demo.dataDesc: Make informed farming decisions based on real-time market and weather data
demo.footerText: Built for farmers, by developers who care about agriculture ЁЯМ▒

weather.title: Agribloom Weather
weather.noWeather: Click "Get Live Weather" to see real-time weather data and alerts.

mandi.title: Agribloom Mandi Prices
mandi.checkOptions: Checking available options in the dropdowns above
mandi.selectAndClick: Select commodity and state, then click "Get Prices" to see current mandi rates.

hero.title: Nurture Your Crops With Smart Farming
hero.description: AgriBloom helps you monitor pest attacks, manage your farm, and grow more efficiently.

features.title: What You Can Explore
features.agrilensDesc: Detailed crop information: sunlight, water, seasons, flowering, harvesting, and scientific names.
features.insectDesc: Detect pests early and follow effective management techniques to protect your crops.
features.healthDesc: Explore the nutritional and medicinal advantages of each fruit, vegetable, and crop.
features.medicinalDesc: Identify herbal plants with healing benefits and know which ones are harmful or toxic.
features.soilDesc: Understand various soil types and fertilizers to boost yield and crop health.
features.marketDesc: Check real-time vegetable and fruit prices from regional Indian markets.
features.shelfDesc: Know how long harvested crops stay fresh and how to store them for longer shelf life.
features.farmingDesc: Learn about hybridization, grafting, irrigation types, vertical farming, and more.

whyChooseUs.title: Why Choose AgriBloom?
whyChooseUs.subtitle: We don't believe in random internet farming tips. AgriBloom is built on reliable, government-verified data, field research, and a deep understanding of what Indian farmers really need.
whyChooseUs.trustedDesc: We rely on government portals, agricultural universities, and verified farming communities. No random content here.
whyChooseUs.fieldDesc: Our information isn't just theoretical тАФ it's validated by real farmers and agronomists across India.
whyChooseUs.searchDesc: Stop hopping between 10 websites. Get sunlight, pests, soil, and market data тАФ all in one place.
whyChooseUs.simplifiedDesc: From new farmers to agri students to experts, our platform is designed to be clear, focused, and helpful.

callToAction.authenticatedDesc: Jump back into AgriLens, check market rates, or explore new fertilizer tips curated just for you.
callToAction.unauthenticatedTitle: Ready to Grow Smarter with AgriBloom?
callToAction.unauthenticatedDesc: Join thousands of farmers, students, and agri experts who rely on AgriBloom for verified crop guidance and seasonal insights.
